body: Can you use the expect tests capability from Python instead of doing these tests as hardcoded literals? This will make it a lot easier to update the tests if pretty printing changes, as you will be able to just `--accept` the changes.
body_html: Can you use the expect tests capability from Python instead of doing these tests as hardcoded literals? This will make it a lot easier to update the tests if pretty printing changes, as you will be able to just --accept the changes.
